column2: "Na muhun dɛ Eguambaa no tseew nsɔwano esuon no mu kor ano
column3: na metsee atseasefo baanan no mu baako dɛ ɔdze ndze a ɔtse dɛ senaman see dɛ

column5: na nyia ɔtse no do no kitsa egyen; na wɔmaa no ahenkyɛw: na otuu ntsen a oridzi konyim kɔ konyim mu."

column2: "Na ɔtseew nsɔwano a otsia ebien no ano no
column3: metsee ɔtseasefo a otsia ebien no dɛ ɔse
na wɔmaa nyia ɔtse no do no tum dɛ onkeyi asomdwee mfi asaase do
column5: na wɔmaa no afona kɛse bi."

column2: "Na ɔtseew nsɔwano a otsia ebiasa no ano no
column3: metsee ɔtseasefo a otsia ebiasa no dɛ ɔse
column7: na nyia ɔtse no do no kitsa nsɛn wɔ ne nsamu."

column2: "Na metsee ndze bi wɔ atseasefo baanan no finimfin dɛ ɔse
column3: Ewifua esusudze kor na atoko esusudze ebiasa nyɛ ɔpaanyi ne da kor akatua
column4: naaso wenyin nye ngo no dze

column2: "Na ɔtseew nsɔwano a otsia anan no ano no
column3: metsee ɔtseasefo a otsia anan no ndze dɛ ɔse

column4: ɔpɔnkɔ a no ho nsonso: na nyia ɔtse no do no
column5: ne dzin dze Owu; na Samanadze dzi n’ekyir. Na wɔmaa hɔn asaase nkyekyɛmu anan mu kor do tum
column9: nye asaase do mbowa abɔyafo nkuku hɔn."

column2: "Na ɔtseew nsɔwano a otsia enum no ano no
column3: muhun hɔn a Nyankopɔn asɛm nye dase a wodzii ntsi wokunkum hɔn no
column4: hɔn akra wɔ afɔrmbukyia no ase:"

column2: "na wɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu dɛ
column5: onkodu dabɛn na irummbua atsɛn na eronntɔ hɔn a wɔtse asaase do hɔn bɔgyaa do wer?"

column2: "Na wɔmemaa hɔn mu baako biara atar fitaa; na wɔsee hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔ do nhom mber kakra
column3: nkodu dɛ hɔn nwurakowaa nye hɔn nuanom a woboku hɔn dɛ hɔnara so no hɔn dodow bɔso ano."

column2: "Na ɔtseew nsɔwano a otsia esia no ano no
column5: na ewia yɛɛ tumm dɛ eyitam

column3: dɛ adɔmbadua a mframa kɛse wosow no ropo n’adɔmba bun."

column2: "Na ɔsor yewee dɛ nwoma a wɔabobɔw; na mbepɔw nye nsupruw nyina tutui fifii mbrɛ wɔwɔ."

column4: sumasumaa abodan nye mbepɔw do abotan no mu;"

column2: "na wɔsee abotan nye mbepɔw no dɛ
column3: Hom nhwɛ hɛn do mfa hɛn nsuma mfi nyia ɔtse ahengua do no n’enyim
column4: nye Eguambaa no n’ebufuw no ho:"

column2: "osiandɛ hɔn ebufuw da kɛse no aba
column3: na woana na obotum egyina enyim?"
